items.name: init(length: Int32, voice: VoiceSpec, version: Int32, name: Str63, comment: Str255, gender: Int16, age: Int16, script: Int16, language: Int16, region: Int16, reserved: (Int32, Int32, Int32, Int32))
var age: Int16
items.desc: The approximate age in years of the individual represented by the voice.

items.name: var comment: Str255
items.desc: Additional text information about the voice. Some synthesizers use this field to store a phrase that can be spoken.

items.name: var gender: Int16
items.desc: The gender of the individual represented by the voice. See Gender Constants.

items.name: var language: Int16
items.desc: A code that indicates the language of voice output.

items.name: var length: Int32
items.desc: The size of the voice description structure, in bytes.

items.name: var name: Str63
items.desc: The name of the voice, preceded by a length byte. Names must be 63 characters or less.

items.name: var region: Int16
items.desc: A code that indicates the region represented by the voice.

items.name: var reserved: (Int32, Int32, Int32, Int32)
items.desc: Reserved. May be used to hold a 32-bit encoding value, if necessary (see the description of the script field for more information).

items.name: var script: Int16
items.desc: The encoding code of the text that the voice can process.

items.name: var version: Int32
items.desc: The version number of the voice.

items.name: var voice: VoiceSpec
items.desc: A voice specification structure that uniquely identifies the voice.
